summary.span: 表示 的資料表集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含所有特定物件。The contains all the objects for a particular . 若要存取的，使用屬性。To access the of a , use the property. 使用方法，例如， ，和管理集合中的項目。The uses methods such as , , and to manage the items in the collection. 使用方法來判斷集合是否為特定資料表 （索引或名稱所指定）。Use the method to determine whether a particular table (specified by either index or name) is in the collection. 若要從一個資料表瀏覽至另一個，使用或屬性存取其集合物件。To navigate from one table to another, use the or property of the to access its collection of objects. 您也可以使用來瀏覽的父子式關聯性的屬性`DataTables`依特定集合。You can also use the property to navigate through the parent/child relationships of the `DataTables` in a particular collection. ## Examples 在此範例中第一個程序會擷取的並列印每個資料行，每個資料列，每個資料表中的值。The first procedure in this example retrieves the of a and prints the value of each column, in each row, of each table. 第二個程序建立新具有兩個資料行，並將它加入。The second procedure creates a new with two columns, and adds it to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類型是安全多執行緒的讀取作業。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

summary.span: 使用預設名稱建立新的 物件，並將它加入至集合。

span.span: Creates a new object by using a default name and adds it to the collection.
The newly created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為未指定名稱，`DataTable`使用預設名稱，相對於其加法順序所建立。Because no name is specified, the `DataTable` is created by using a default name, relative to its order of addition. 預設名稱是"Table1"。The default name is "Table1." 成功會將資料表加入至集合時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會將三個新物件加入至使用不含引數的方法。The following example adds three new objects to the using the method without arguments. The newly created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`null`或空字串 ("") 傳遞預設名稱提供在中，以新建`DataTable`。If either `null` or an empty string ("") is passed in, a default name is given to the newly created `DataTable`. 這個名稱根據 （"Table1"、"Table2"等等），已加入資料表的順序。This name is based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 如果資料表已成功加入至集合，就會發生事件。The event occurs if the table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會將具有指定名稱來。The following example adds a with the given name to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的名稱物件使用屬性。You specify the name of the object by using the property. 如果您將加入至包含集合方法，傳遞任何引數，資料表有一個預設名稱，根據 （"Table1"、"Table2"等等），已加入的資料表的順序。If you add a to the collection with the method, passing no arguments, the table is given a default name, based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 若要取得之索引的，使用方法。To get the index of a , use the method. > [!NOTE] > 傳回`false`當兩個或多個資料表具有相同名稱但不同的命名空間。Returns `false` when two or more tables have the same name but different namespaces. 如果資料表名稱無法完全與單一資料表相符 (即有任何名稱語意模糊)，呼叫就會失敗。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a table name to exactly one table. ## Examples 下列範例會測試是否與名稱"供應商 」 資料表存在於。The following example tests whether a table with the name "Suppliers" exists in the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果名稱存在，並符合大小寫的搜尋字串，它會傳回。If a name exists that matches the case of the search string, it is returned. 否則不會執行不區分大小寫的搜尋，而且如果找到名稱符合這項搜尋，它會傳回。Otherwise a case-insensitive search is performed, and if a name is found that matches this search, it is returned. 使用方法，以判斷是否有特定的名稱或索引的資料表。Use the method to determine whether a table with a specific name or index exists. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取單一資料表，依名稱從。The following example retrieves a single table by name from the .
